articles.author: Damien Wilde
articles.title: WhatsApp companion mode now rolling out to all beta users - 9to5Google
articles.description: After months of testing, the dedicated "companion mode" for WhatsApp is now rolling out for all beta users on Android.
articles.content:
After months of teasing, and then testing with a limited pool of users, the dedicated “companion mode” for WhatsApp is now rolling out for all beta users on Android.
While workarounds have existed t… [+1822 chars]
